Detailed Description

Create a security agent for a database.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ SecurityAgent()

storage::ittiadb::SecurityAgent::SecurityAgent ( Connection &  db_handle)
inlineexplicit

Create a security agent for a database.

Parameters
db_handle
Returns
DB_NOERROR on success, negative number on failure

A handle to a database connection object. The connection must be opened before any member functions can be used.

Member Function Documentation

◆ train_sql_watchdog()

db_result_t storage::ittiadb::SecurityAgent::train_sql_watchdog ( )
inline

Begin training security watchdog.

Returns
DB_NOERROR on success, negative number on failure
  • Use this function to begin training the Security Agent, the Security Agent must be initialized to begin training the SQL watchdog.

◆ disable_sql_watchdog()

db_result_t storage::ittiadb::SecurityAgent::disable_sql_watchdog ( )
inline

Stop training security watchdog.

Returns
DB_NOERROR on success, negative number on failure
  • Use this function to stop training the Security Agent, the Security Agent must be initialized to stop training the SQL watchdog.

◆ enable_sql_watchdog()

db_result_t storage::ittiadb::SecurityAgent::enable_sql_watchdog ( )
inline

Enable training security watchdog.

Returns
DB_NOERROR on success, negative number on failure
  • Use this function to enable the Security Agent, the Security Agent must be initialized to be enabled, and and ensure the watchdog has been trained.

◆ get_sql_allowed_list_size()

db_len_t storage::ittiadb::SecurityAgent::get_sql_allowed_list_size ( )
inline

Get the number of training rules from the watchdog.

Returns
Integer value indicating the number of rules the SQL watchdog has seen during training.
  • Use this function to determine how many rules the watchdog has seen during training.

◆ is_sql_watchdog_enabled()

bool storage::ittiadb::SecurityAgent::is_sql_watchdog_enabled ( )
inline

Determine if the SQL watchdog is enabled.

Returns
true - enabled false - disabled
  • Use this function to determine if the SQL watchdog has been enabled.

◆ is_sql_watchdog_training()

bool storage::ittiadb::SecurityAgent::is_sql_watchdog_training ( )
inline

Determine if the SQL watchdog is training.

Returns
true - training false - not training
  • Use this function to determine if the SQL watchdog is training or not.
